explanation: [0-0] Five girls in brightly colored sportswear, from left to right: light green, red, blue, pink, and yellow, wearing white socks, stand on the grass in a park with their hands on their hips. The background is green trees and several tall buildings, under a blue sky. The text "When someone gets a tumbling mental block" is displayed at the top of the screen.
[0-3] Then, the girls strike a boxing pose.
